column1: #Text=No , at that point my body just gave out , I was completely relaxed and I was just like ... that 's it .
#Text=Sharin , did you ever have a moment where you confronted your own death ?
#Text=When I was nine years old I was definitely close , but I was n't aware of how dangerous it was .
#Text=When I think of it now I 'm like , " Wow !

#Text=But religion can also add a lot of purpose to people , and when they have purpose they can be more balanced and open-minded .

column1: #Text=Sune definitely uses it all the time .
#Text=What do you think is the greatest depth of human misery ?
#Text=Yeah , and it just seems so unnecessary .
#Text=Being in Darfur right now , for instance .
#Text=That 's one of the extremes of human misery , when you are so completely innocent .
#Text=And seemingly so few people are paying attention .
#Text=Has the Iraq War affected either of you as artists at all ?
